channel.title: James Fenn - Linux
channel.description: Writer of bad puns and slightly better software. This website contains information about my adventures in programming, current projects, and me.

item.title: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH
item.description: A small command-line utility I wrote with Go that I had a lot of fun with.

item.title: Joining Freenode IRC: A Guide
item.description: Basic (but detailed) instructions for setting up a Freenode IRC account through various clients.
